name: Top of the food chain to you
name_original: Top of the food chain to you
description: You got the need, the need ... The need to eat. Nature made you cold-blooded killing machine, and skimming off the top of nature's bounty is just what you do. But the hunger is real, it is always hanging over your head. Gnawing, aching hunger. You have the cure though, and you have a ripping idea or two. Maybe today, you will meet a sailor? You will eat once the lazy developer gets ducks in a row. Did you say ducks, never tried those. Gimme some!
